meanings.definition: A dish with a lightly browned crust of breadcrumbs or melted cheese.
meanings.sent1: The gratin was bubbling hot and smelled delicious.
meanings.sent2: She baked a potato gratin for the family dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cheesy gratin was so good, it disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The golden crust on the gratin was like a treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The gratin was so cheesy and gooey, it was impossible to resist.

meanings.definition: A culinary technique where an ingredient is topped with a browned crust.
meanings.sent1: The chef used the gratin technique to make the dish extra special.
meanings.sent2: The gratin added a delicious crunch to the top of the casserole.
meanings.sent3: The gratin technique turned a simple dish into a gourmet masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: The gratin crust on the dish was like a crown fit for a king.
meanings.sent5: The gratin technique transformed the plain vegetables into a culinary work of art.
